articles.author: Benjamin Pope
articles.title: How we sharpened the James Webb telescope's vision from a million kilometers away - Phys.org
articles.description: After Christmas dinner in 2021, our family was glued to the television, watching the nail-biting launch of NASA's US$10 billion (AU$15 billion) James Webb Space Telescope. There had not been such a leap forward in telescope technology since Hubble was launche…
